summary:
A little mod that removes the keyword "racetoscale" which will allow npcs so stay at their set height instead of increasing and decreasing when they interact with a object

This does not touch any objects so it will work on everything that has that keyword

If a npc is smaller or bigger than the base height 1.0 they
descriptionHtml:
A little mod that removes the keyword "racetoscale" which will allow npcs so stay at their set height instead of increasing and decreasing when they interact with a object

This does not touch any objects so it will work on everything that has that keyword

If a npc is smaller or bigger than the base height 1.0 they will not regrow or shrink when they activate a furniture.Â 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/4259?]SSE Version

[/url]We did it boys.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80763-0-1481856578.png[/img]
author: Abbalovesyou
